featured.text: Swappers are supposed to make sure their home is in order before they depart, but one person’s idea of “clean” may be more forgiving than another’s.

definition.zh_def: 寬恕的，能夠原諒他人的過錯或傷害的。
definition.en_def: Willing to forgive; showing a readiness to pardon or overlook mistakes or offenses.
definition.example: She was very forgiving, always ready to let go of past grievances.
